sense.def:
To repeat something
pomeni nekaj znova reči ali napisati.

seg.quote: Haldane repeated his statement in the presence of the Prime Minister.
‘We need half a million dollars,’ Monty kept repeating. ‘Half a million dollars.’

sense.def:
To repeat something
pomeni povedati ali napisati isto, kar je povedal ali napisal že nekdo drug.

seg.quote: Ballin repeated what he had been told by Haldane.

sense.def:
To repeat oneself
pomeni nenamerno še enkrat povedati, kar smo že rekli.

seg.quote: People tend to repeat themselves a lot in conversation.

sense.def:
To repeat an action
pomeni še enkrat narediti isto dejanje.

seg.quote: I decided not to repeat the mistake of my first marriage.

sense.def:
To repeat a television or radio programme
pomeni znova predvajati televizijsko ali radijsko oddajo.

A repeat
je nekaj, kar spet naredimo ali kar se spet zgodi.

seg.quote: They're all old films or repeats.
He didn't want a repeat of yesterday's scene with Hooper.
